caption.p: Crystal structure of M pro. Marked regions correspond to F(0.1923)—red (residues 131–195), F(0.3183)—yellow (residues 151–183), F(0.4414)—green (residues 72–136) and F(0.1054)—blue (residues 182–214). Note that regions F(0.1923) and F(0.3183) overlap, as well as F(0.4414) and F(0.1923); also F(0.3183) and F(0.1054). The bound compound is the co-crystalized inhibitor N3.
